Architecture Overview

Inheritance Hierarchy

graph TD
    A[ORSG_QuestionDetail<br/>Abstract Base] --> B[ORSG_QuestionDetailEmpty<br/>Null Object]
    A --> C[ORSG_QuestionDetailList<br/>Multi-option Questions]
    A --> D[ORSG_QuestionDetailToggle<br/>Binary Questions]
    
    subgraph "Factory Support"
        E[ORSG_QuestionDetailFactory]
        F[ORSG_QuestionDetailBuilder]
    end
    
    subgraph "Container Layer"
        G[ORSG_Questionnaire]
        H[ORSG_QuestionDefault]
    end
    
    E -.-> A
    F -.-> A
    G --> H
    H --> A
    
    style A fill:#e1f5fe
    style E fill:#fff3e0
    style F fill:#fff3e0

    subgraph "Client Layer"

        K[Database]
    end
    
    A --> C
    B --> C
    C --> E
    C --> H
    D --> F
    F --> G
    H --> G
    I --> G
    C --> J
    J --> K

Data Flow Diagrams

Question Creation Flow

sequenceDiagram
    participant UI as User Interface
    participant SVC as Question Service
    participant FAC as Factory
    participant BLD as Builder
    participant MODEL as Question Model
    participant DB as Database
    
    UI->>SVC: Create Question Request
    SVC->>BLD: Builder.Empty()
    BLD->>BLD: OfType(QuestionType)
    BLD->>BLD: WithOptions(...)
    BLD->>MODEL: Build()
    MODEL->>MODEL: SerializeToJson()
    SVC->>DB: Save QuestionDetailJson
    DB-->>SVC: Confirmation
    SVC-->>UI: Question Created

Question Deserialization Flow

sequenceDiagram
    participant DB as Database
    participant SVC as Service
    participant FAC as Factory
    participant DETAIL as QuestionDetail
    participant MODEL as Concrete Type
    
    SVC->>DB: Fetch QuestionDetailJson
    DB-->>SVC: JSON String
    SVC->>FAC: CreateDetailFromJson(json)
    FAC->>FAC: GetTypeFromJson(json)
    FAC->>DETAIL: DeserializeFromJson(json)
    DETAIL->>MODEL: Create Concrete Instance
    MODEL-->>DETAIL: Concrete Object
    DETAIL-->>FAC: Question Detail
    FAC-->>SVC: Typed Question Detail

Question Update Flow

flowchart TD
    A[Update Request] --> B{Question Exists?}
    B -->|No| C[Create New]
    B -->|Yes| D[Load Existing]
    D --> E[LoadContentsFrom]
    E --> F[Update Properties]
    F --> G[SerializeToJson]
    G --> H[Save to Database]
    C --> I[Use Builder Pattern]
    I --> G
    H --> J[Update Complete]

Architectural Decisions

1. Abstract Base Class Design

Decision: Use abstract base class with template methods Rationale:

  • Provides consistent interface across all question types
  • Enables polymorphic behavior
  • Centralizes common serialization logic
  • Enforces implementation contracts

2. Factory Pattern Implementation

Decision: Static factory with type detection Rationale:

  • Centralizes object creation logic
  • Supports dynamic type determination from JSON
  • Maintains single responsibility principle
  • Enables easy extension for new question types

3. JSON Serialization Strategy

Decision: Embedded JSON in database entities Rationale:

  • Supports complex polymorphic structures
  • Maintains type safety in application code
  • Enables schema flexibility
  • Simplifies database design

4. Builder Pattern Usage

Decision: Fluent builder for complex object construction Rationale:

  • Improves code readability
  • Supports step-by-step object building
  • Enables method chaining
  • Provides validation points

Design Principles Applied

SOLID Principles

  • Single Responsibility: Each class has one reason to change
  • Open/Closed: Open for extension (new question types), closed for modification
  • Liskov Substitution: Derived classes can replace base class instances
  • Interface Segregation: Focused, cohesive interfaces
  • Dependency Inversion: Depend on abstractions, not concretions

Design Patterns

  • Template Method: SerializeToJson() provides common algorithm
  • Factory Method: Dynamic object creation based on type
  • Builder: Complex object construction with fluent interface
  • Null Object: Safe default behavior without null checks
  • Strategy: Different behaviors for different question types
